T02D3245c:12a-1: a'arya dz'am gu l'i s'a dha nam /
T02D3245c:12a-3: 'phags ma dug sel ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3245c:12a-4: sngar bshad pa'i cho ga'i rim pas stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes thogs la /
T02D3245c:12a-5: padma dmar po dang zla ba la yi ge dz'am
T02D3245c:12a-6: ser po yongs su gyur pas 'phags ma dug sel
T02D3245c:12a-7: ma ser mo zhal gsum phyag drug mar skad cig
T02D3245c:12a-9: g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal ni mthing nag dang dkar po //
T02D3245c:12a-10: ral gri dang rdo rje dang mda' ni g-yas pa'i phyag gsum na'o //
T02D3245c:12a-11: sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang /
T02D3245c:12a-12: dug gi me tog dang gzhu ni g-yon gyi gsum na'o //
T02D3245c:12a-13: gdengs ka rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor dbus la gnas pa /
T02D3245c:12a-14: sbrul dang lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /
T02D3245c:12a-16: gzhon nu ma'i mtshan rnams kyis mchog tu 'bar ba /
T02D3245c:12a-17: dbu la mi bskyod pa bzhugs par bsgoms la sngags bzla bar bya ste /
T02D3245c:12a-18: aom dz'am gu l'i sarba bi sha pra sha ma ni phu sv'a h'a /
T02D3245c:12a-19: 'phags ma dug sel ma'i sgrub thabs so /
